greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Average digit (rounded to the nearest integer) in the decimal expansion of n-th prime.
example: For the prime 107 we have nearest((1+0+7)/3)=nearest(8/3)=3.
results.author: Y. Kelly Itakura (yitkr(AT)mta.ca), Aug 23 2002
ext: Changed offset to 1, added Cf. to A074462 and extended. - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 23 2008
